recipes.label: The Course of the Heart
recipes.startdescription: Whenever the principle of the Heart is implicated, I may gain Vitality.
recipes.description: My own heart pumps more strongly, today.

recipes.label: A Light in the Skull
recipes.startdescription: Whenever the principle of the Lantern sheds its light, I may recall additional scraps of knowledge.
recipes.description: Dusty facts have come clear in my brain. For now, at least.

recipes.label: Old Unhappy Far-off Things
recipes.startdescription: Moth finds the light in the dark, and so do I.
recipes.description: A half-glimpsed wistfulness has touched me.

recipes.label: The Dark, the Light
recipes.startdescription: Moth finds the light in the dark, and so do I.
recipes.description: What could I be if I could be not this?

recipes.label: The Place Behind Desire
recipes.startdescription: Is there something to be learnt from the satisfaction of desire?

recipes.label: Night Terrors
recipes.startdescription: I wake in the night. My palms, my face, are beaded with sweat.
recipes.description: Slowly, my clenched fists relax. I'll slide back into sleep. But something will remain, like spiderwebs in the corner of the room.

recipes.label: Night Terrors
recipes.comments: Only triggers if there's already Dread in whatever called this.

recipes.label: New Colours
recipes.startdescription: I have begun to notice colours in the world for which I have no name.
recipes.description: I am seeing things I shouldn't. I know this is dangerous. But it's difficult not to long for it.

recipes.label: The Public Gaze
recipes.startdescription: I've used a follower who's too well-known. The Suppression Bureau may hear of it.

recipes.label: The Creeping Colour
recipes.startdescription: My passions are poisoned. Each pang of emotion brings an answering pang of savage grey.

recipes.label: Relentless Light
recipes.startdescription: A candle, when burned, brings light. When my thoughts ignite, what then?

recipes.label: The Hospitality of Agony
recipes.startdescription: I have invited an old friend to lair in my muscles for one more day.

recipes.label: The Benefits of Privacy
recipes.startdescription: We've taken care to locate our headquarters somewhere out of the way...
recipes.description: ...perhaps it will be harder for the Suppression Bureau to follow leads to our door. It may also be harder to sustain a reputation.
